suites.title: GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked

tests.title: THEN the Category, Manufacturer and Price Range search features are displayed
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked THEN the Category, Manufacturer and Price Range search features are displayed

tests.title: THEN all the categories stated in the requirements (wireframe sketch) are present as options
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Category THEN all the categories stated in the requirements (wireframe sketch) are present as options

tests.title: THEN all the categories are sorted alphabetically
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Category THEN all the categories are sorted alphabetically

err.message: AssertionError: expected 'All,Computers,Computers >> Desktops,Computers >> Notebooks,Computers >> Software,Electronics,Electronics >> Camera & photo,Electronics >> Cell phones,Electronics >> Others,Apparel,Apparel >> Shoes,Apparel >> Clothing,Apparel >> Accessories,Digital downloads,Books,Jewelry,Gift Cards' to equal 'All,Apparel,Apparel >> Accessories,Apparel >> Clothing,Apparel >> Shoes,Books,Computers,Computers >> Desktops,Computers >> Notebooks,Computers >> Software,Digital downloads,Electronics,Electronics >> Camera & photo,Electronics >> Cell phones,Electronics >> Others,Gift Cards,Jewelry'

AssertionError: expected 'All,Computers,Computers >> Desktops,Computers >> Notebooks,Computers >> Software,Electronics,Electronics >> Camera & photo,Electronics >> Cell phones,Electronics >> Others,Apparel,Apparel >> Shoes,Apparel >> Clothing,Apparel >> Accessories,Digital downloads,Books,Jewelry,Gift Cards' to equal 'All,Apparel,Apparel >> Accessories,Apparel >> Clothing,Apparel >> Shoes,Books,Computers,Computers >> Desktops,Computers >> Notebooks,Computers >> Software,Digital downloads,Electronics,Electronics >> Camera & photo,Electronics >> Cell phones,Electronics >> Others,Gift Cards,Jewelry'

tests.title: WHEN selecting the `All` option THEN search returns products from all categories
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Category WHEN selecting the `All` option THEN search returns products from all categories

tests.title: WHEN selecting a sub-category THEN search only returns products from that sub-category
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Category WHEN selecting a sub-category THEN search only returns products from that sub-category

tests.title: WHEN selecting a top category AND the `Automatically search sub categories` checkbox is NOT checked THEN search does NOT return products from this category's sub-categories
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Category WHEN selecting a top category AND the `Automatically search sub categories` checkbox is NOT checked THEN search does NOT return products from this category's sub-categories

tests.title: WHEN selecting a top category AND the `Automatically search sub categories` checkbox is checked THEN search returns products from this category's sub-categories
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Category WHEN selecting a top category AND the `Automatically search sub categories` checkbox is checked THEN search returns products from this category's sub-categories

tests.title: THEN all the manufacturers stated in the requirements (wireframe sketch) are present as options
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Manufacturer THEN all the manufacturers stated in the requirements (wireframe sketch) are present as options

tests.title: WHEN selecting the `All` option THEN search returns products from all manufacturers
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Manufacturer WHEN selecting the `All` option THEN search returns products from all manufacturers

tests.title: WHEN selecting a manufacturer THEN search returns only products from that manufacturer
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Manufacturer WHEN selecting a manufacturer THEN search returns only products from that manufacturer

tests.title: WHEN the price range values are valid THEN search only returns products within the Price Range
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Price Range WHEN the price range values are valid THEN search only returns products within the Price Range

tests.title: WHEN the price range values are invalid (non-numerical) THEN search dismisses those values (and acts as if no price range values were entered)
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Price Range WHEN the price range values are invalid (non-numerical) THEN search dismisses those values (and acts as if no price range values were entered)

tests.title: WHEN the price range values are LOGICALLY invalid (price from higher than price to) THEN search returns no products
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Price Range WHEN the price range values are LOGICALLY invalid (price from higher than price to) THEN search returns no products

tests.title: WHEN only one price range value is entered (and is valid) THEN the price range filtering still functions and search only returns products accordingly
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Price Range WHEN only one price range value is entered (and is valid) THEN the price range filtering still functions and search only returns products accordingly

tests.title: WHEN the Search In Product Descriptions checkbox is checked THEN search return products that have the search term either in their title or description
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Search In Product Descriptions WHEN the Search In Product Descriptions checkbox is checked THEN search return products that have the search term either in their title or description

tests.title: WHEN the Search In Product Descriptions checkbox is NOT checked THEN search return products that have the search term in their title
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Middle Search Bar GIVEN the Advanced Search checkbox is checked functionality - Search In Product Descriptions WHEN the Search In Product Descriptions checkbox is NOT checked THEN search return products that have the search term in their title

suites.title: GIVEN `%%%` (without the quotes) was searched for in the Middle Search Bar

tests.title: THEN all the Products Sort By options stated in the requirements (wireframe sketch) are present

tests.title: WHEN selecting `Name: A to Z` Products Sort By option THEN the products are sorted alphabetically

tests.title: WHEN selecting `Price: Low to High` Products Sort By option THEN the products are sorted accordingly

tests.title: WHEN selecting a Products Page Size option (e.g. 3) THEN only (e.g. 3) products per page are displayed
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Product Selectors and Pagination GIVEN `%%%` (without the quotes) was searched for in the Middle Search Bar functionality - Products Page Size WHEN selecting a Products Page Size option (e.g. 3) THEN only (e.g. 3) products per page are displayed

suites.title: GIVEN the Products Page Size option 3 is selected

tests.title: WHEN the 3rd pagination page is clicked THEN the user is taken to the correct (3rd) pagination page
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Product Selectors and Pagination GIVEN `%%%` (without the quotes) was searched for in the Middle Search Bar functionality - Pagination GIVEN the Products Page Size option 3 is selected WHEN the 3rd pagination page is clicked THEN the user is taken to the correct (3rd) pagination page

tests.title: WHEN clicking on the pagination `next page` (i.e. `>`) THEN the user is taken to the correct (2nd) pagination page
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Product Selectors and Pagination GIVEN `%%%` (without the quotes) was searched for in the Middle Search Bar functionality - Pagination GIVEN the Products Page Size option 3 is selected WHEN clicking on the pagination `next page` (i.e. `>`) THEN the user is taken to the correct (2nd) pagination page

tests.title: WHEN clicking the pagination `last page` (i.e. `>>`) THEN the user is taken to the correct pagination page
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Product Selectors and Pagination GIVEN `%%%` (without the quotes) was searched for in the Middle Search Bar functionality - Pagination GIVEN the Products Page Size option 3 is selected WHEN clicking the pagination `last page` (i.e. `>>`) THEN the user is taken to the correct pagination page

tests.title: WHEN clicking the pagination `previous page` (i.e. `<`) THEN the user is taken to the correct pagination page
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Product Selectors and Pagination GIVEN `%%%` (without the quotes) was searched for in the Middle Search Bar functionality - Pagination GIVEN the Products Page Size option 3 is selected WHEN clicking the pagination `previous page` (i.e. `<`) THEN the user is taken to the correct pagination page

tests.title: WHEN clicking the pagination `first page` (i.e. `<<`) THEN the user is taken to the correct pagination page
tests.fullTitle: nopCommerce GIVEN the nopCommerce Search page is accessed (https://demo.nopcommerce.com/search?q=) area - Product Selectors and Pagination GIVEN `%%%` (without the quotes) was searched for in the Middle Search Bar functionality - Pagination GIVEN the Products Page Size option 3 is selected WHEN clicking the pagination `first page` (i.e. `<<`) THEN the user is taken to the correct pagination page
